title: Configure Poetry/PDM for dependency management
description: Setup modern Python dependency management with Poetry or PDM. Include lock file, dev dependencies separation, and scripts for common tasks. Configure dependency groups for dev, test, docs, and optional AI providers.

comments.author: jared@goatbytes.io
comments.content:
Configured Poetry for dependency management:

**Setup:**
- Migrated build backend from Hatchling to Poetry Core
- Configured Poetry with src/ layout package discovery
- Added tool.poetry section with project metadata

**Dependency Groups:**
- Main dependencies: textual, langchain providers, click, pydantic
- dev group: pytest, ruff, mypy, pre-commit
- docs group: sphinx, sphinx-rtd-theme, sphinx-autodoc-typehints
- security group: safety, bandit[toml]

**Poetry Configuration:**
- Python version constraint: ^3.10
- Package location: src/consoul
- CLI script: consoul → consoul.__main__:main
- All dependency versions use caret (^) constraints for SemVer compatibility

**Lock File:**
- Generated poetry.lock with all resolved dependencies
- Ensures reproducible builds across environments
- Ready for poetry install
